snippet.title: Overcooked! 2 - Winter Wonderland Update Out Now!
snippet.description:
The Winter Wonderland update is available now for Overcooked! 2 - for FREE! 
Learn more: http://bit.ly/OC2WinterWonderland

Winter Wonderland is a celebration of the 2019 DLC for Overcooked! 2 and includes brand new seasonally dressed kitchens inspired by Campfire Cook Off, Night of the Hangry Horde and Carnival of Chaos! This update is available on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Xbox One and PC.

Overcooked! 2 is available now on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Xbox One and PC.

You can also purchase the Season Pass which includes access to three DLCs - Campfire Cook Off, Night of the Hangry Horde and Carnival of Chaos.

Steam: http://bit.ly/Overcooked2Steam
Nintendo Switch: http://bit.ly/Overcooked2Switch
PS4: http://bit.ly/Overcooked2PS4
Xbox One: http://bit.ly/Overcooked2Xbox

Keep up to date with the latest Overcooked! news:

Subscribe to the Team17 newsletter: https://www.team17.com/sign-up/
Official website: https://www.team17.com/games/overcook...
Follow Overcooked! on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Overcookedgame
Follow Team17 on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Team17Ltd
Like Overcooked! on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/overcookedgame/
Like Team17 on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Team17/
Team17 on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/Team17


About Team17 Digital Ltd

Founded in 1990, Team17 Digital Limited is a leading international games label that hosts the Worms franchise, Aven Colony, The Escapists, Genesis Alpha One, Overcooked, Sword Legacy: Omen, Yoku’s Island Express, Yooka-Laylee and many more from developers around the world. Visit www.team17.com for more info.
